items.title: mutant
items.valueLabel: May. 2022 ~ Sep. 2022 - [Junior Development Analyst] Mutant - Vivo
items.valueDescription: Employed by Mutant, I was allocated to work for Vivo. The job consisted of the development and maintenance of use case dialogs for Aura, the company's AI, in the context of customer service via WhatsApp. I deepened my knowledge of Agile Methodologies, typescript, use of javascript classes and npm packages development.

items.title: rifaisso
items.valueDescription: I fully developed an API for Rifaisso, from its beginning to the first commercial version. It was developed using Typescript with AdonisJs and docker. During the development, I integrated the Mercado Pago API, made CRON routines, and learned AdonisJs and Docker implementation, which I was not familiar with.

items.title: teachlearn
items.valueDescription: I took part into the development of TeachLearn's first versions, made in Vue.js with Quasar and Node.js with Express.js. My tasks involved both, front end and back end development, but most of them were on the development of endpoints. One of my most notorious activities at this service, was the development and implementation of a chat system with socket.io.

items.title: dourasoftFree
items.valueDescription: After my Computer Engineering mandatory internship, I did some services as a Freelancer at Dourasoft. I developed and integrated a Whatsapp bot made with Java and selenium into the company's commercialised system. I also created a SQL script for the database migration from their desktop legacy system to their current web app system.

items.title: dourasoftIntern
items.valueDescription: To conclude my Computer Engineering course, I did my mandatory internship at Dourasoft, where I developed an OCR functionality to be integrated into company's developed and commercialised system. It was done with Amazon Textract (OCR). During the internship, Vue.js with Quasar, PHP with CakePHP, PostgreSQL, Google Cloud Services and Firebase skills were also learned.

items.valueDescription: [Project available on GitHub] This project regards the development of this version of my professional portfolio, made in Vue.js with tailwind, hosted on AWS, and animations made with Green Sock (GSAP).

items.title: myCrurriculum
items.valueDescription: [Project available on GitHub] Preview available at portfolio-232.web.app, this project was the first version of this portfolio. At that time, I had set some extras challenges for me, like using Vue.js with bootstrap, which I haven't used previously, and the development of a CSS animation exclusively for the page.

items.title: cadastrare
items.valueDescription: [Project available on GitHub] In this project I developed a web app to manage the agenda and pacient's files of a dental clinic. Developed with Vue.js with Quasar and Express.js. In terms of experience, this project was important for introducing me to the procedures on how to acquire domains and hosting servers on Ubuntu command line.

items.title: agriv
items.valueDescription: Agriv is a system to collect soil data through a Wireless Sensor Network, developed for the final paper of my Computer Engineering course. Made with another student, my role was to develop the network and put together all the hardware. ESPs 32 were used as gateways and nodes connected to soil sensors to send data to the system's server. This system is composed of the sensor network and a web app to manage it and view the collected data.

items.title: passremind
items.valueDescription: [Project available on GitHub] PassRemind is a password manager web app for personal use, it was developed using Vue.js with Vuetify and firebase, plus, a browser plugin was developed as well. Although, it is not a complex system, this project had its importance for introducing me to the development of browser plugins and the use of Firebase Functions and Firebase Hosting.

Paragraphs: Hi, I'm Fernando. Graduated in Computer Engineering. I'm an aspiring Business Analyst and Software Developer. I am in the middle of a journey of taking on experiences that will help me build a solid pathway into a long lasting IT career.

As a result of all of my efforts up to this point, I have gathered invaluable work experiences and developed a vast range of skills, including strong problem solving skills, an analytical mindset, a solid foundation in corporate communication, business concepts and analytical techniques.

In this portfolio you can find extensive information about my previous work experiences in the "Experience" tab, the "Education" tab contains information related to online courses, certifications and formal degrees I have undertaken. As a consequence of self study, work experiences and educational background, the "Skills" tab has information about hard skills I have been developing throughout the years.

Although most of my previous work experiences have been in web development with NodeJs and VueJs, I have been constantly acquiring knowledge in different aspects of software development and business analysis. My goal is to perform as a Developer while improving myself and acquire more experiences until the point where I will be able to make use of all of my business acumen to work as an ICT Business Analyst or other managemental roles.

The card on the left is there to provide a more straight display of my main skills, the reading of the beneath parts and the "Experience" tab are complementary to each other, giving a little more understanding of my capabilities and current knowledge.

In terms of API development, I've had professional experience using PHP with Cake PHP, but ever since that, I've been using Node.js with Express.js or AdonisJs, and typescript. Unfortunately, I'm not very familiar to automated testing on a professional environment, but I've started studying about unit testing and Ent-to-End testing. Besides that, I've acquired some other skills, for example, usage of sockets; conteiners; cloud services like firebase, GCP and AWS; and creation of linux based web servers from previous experiences.

About front end development, I'm more knowledgeable about Vue.js with some component frameworks such as Quasar, Vuetify, Bootstrap and Tailwind. Due to previous expereiences, I've also learned vanilla HTML, Javascript and CSS.
At the moment, in my spare time, I've been aiming to acquire more knowledge on CSS and JS animations, creation and manipulation of SVGs, automated testing and AWS cloud architecturing.
